page.title: 16Around My House
page.content: {A Chalet bungalow.}Eight other chalet bungalows in the street.Mum,Dad,twin sisters,brother and I live there. Local shops in Adastral Square(ten minutes walk away)while around the corner are shops,health centre,library and Church.From home it is five minutes walk to school.Across the road from school there's heath with football field and assault course. Main shopping complex is at the Arndale Centre in Poole(two miles away;ten minutes by bus).At the ArndaleCentre are a sports centre,library and chain stores.Just down the road from there is the High_Street with a market and typical High_Street shops.The market is on Friday and Saturday.
